title: Tuesdays
alt: Try our bottomless drinks and fall forever!
transcript:
[Ponytail serves Beret Guy and Megan at a table.]
Ponytail: ...and on Tuesdays we offer endless wings.
Beret Guy: Haha, cool.
Beret Guy: i have those.Ponytail: You what?[Beret Guy sprouts a pair of wings.]
Ponytail: AAAAA!![Beret Guy's wings start getting longer.]
Ponytail and Megan: AAAAAAA[Wings start to extend into space out from the earth.]
Everyone: AAAAAAAA
